# Introduction

Hi I'm Sagar Bera a fullstack develover from India, I love to learn and build
stuff from this learnings. I'm a active open source contributor, I support
community building. My primary focus is to make it happen, I belive in
collaboration rather than compitition as we all are developer together we can
make it big.
